record.id: field.name="append.text" and file.name="cm3messages" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: append.text
record.file.name: cm3messages

brief.brief: The customized text to append to the end of the standard message sent to all operators listed in the indicated field.

detail.detail: The <item> is the word Request or Task, <xxx> is the number of the Request or Task, <Phase> is constant, <phase name> is the name of the current phase of the Request or Task, and <append text> is the message you specify.
For example, if you specified Pending your Approval and <xxx> was 123, then the message sent to the operator would be: "Request 123 Phase test Pending your Approval."
